channel.title: Mechs on Albru's trash can
channel.description: Recent content in Mechs on Albru's trash can

item.title: Journey of Zireael
item.description: You know that feel when you’re looking for a new keyboard, but nothing seem to suite you well enough? Well, I went through the struggle a while ago and it wasn’t easy. Both for me and the people trying to help me. Motivation My interest in mechanical keyboards started like two years ago (and it’s worth noting I still haven’t tried any), but I kept telling myself that it’s not necessary, that it’s not a thing I really need.
